DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if ketorolac, given after abdominal myomectomy, will decrease the frequency of post-oerative fevers as well as improve post-operative pain management.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Operative Treatment With Ketorolac After Abdominal Myomectomy
DOC.criteria: Ant patient undregoing abdominal myomectomy Patients with contraindication to NSAIDs including history of peptic ulcer disease, renal disease, bleeding diathesis, or hypersensitivity to NSAIDS
